items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador : DonDiegoSanchez
items.content:
![image.png](https://i.ibb.co/H4XDnNK/image.png)  
  
  
Hi Polkadot,

My name is Andréa Vistoli, also known in the community as DonDiegoSanchez.

We, the DAO, are accomplishing something no other ecosystem nor organization has performed this far, and we’re innovating even more. What we're building has no precedent, no model, and we're following our own path. We're decentralization pioneers, building the future backend of a global economy.

Our ambassadors should fit this reality; they need to be bold, connected, able to innovate, disrupt and try again. This new program is an excellent opportunity for our ecosystem to mature as OpenGov has left a lot of blind spots. It's up to the new team to identify, analyze and try to address them and, if not lead, at least guide our ecosystem.

I'm 40 years old, father of two, pre-redenomination holder, ecosystem agent, serial business founder, former Emmy’s nominee film producer, decentralization cultist, cofounder of a French regulated CASP and I’m facing government bodies, lobbies, medias, listed company and SMEs on a regular basis for the last two years.

I will make an excellent Head Ambassador, I have the vision, the skills, the shoulders to do it and my nonce speaks for me.

I'm a leader, a creator, a process-maker, a true decentralization zealot, and I want to help to build what I hope will become an example for web3, but also for the rest of the world.

I have a wide range of skills and experiences in business, organization, management, regulation, networking, distributed systems and decentralization logic that will be essential to the success of the new program. I'm at the forefront of user adoption, both retail and institutional, through companies I've built. I'm also right in the trenches when it comes to regulation, compliance and lobbying in the wider European zone. My role as co-founder of ChaosDao has also given me acquaintance with a very large sample of the various personalities responsible for making what Polkadot is today, making me quite aware of the struggles and barriers faced by those building it or on it.

I intend to represent Polkadot where it matters most, in the true sense of an ambassador, to the many institutions and actors of the European market. My unique mix of qualities and experiences make me suitable and credible to represent Polkadot in front of listed companies, financial players, lobbies and governments, both to defend it and to help people understand and adopt it.

I also intend to help my fellow Head Ambassadors improve the program. We can build something completely new, transparent and efficient like the technology we will represent. Fueled by the highest expectations of our fellow token holders and built on the same ethos and foundations as Polkadot. Bold, hydrated and decentralized to actually help drive adoption, improve the community sentiment but also be the showcase of what a decentralized organization can achieve.

Finally, I intend to look after my domestic community and market from a business development and user success perspective. I will continue the work that we have already started with some other members of the French-speaking community. We are creating a welcoming and transparent online space supported by the Polkadot Paris Hub, a physical space acting as a real life outpost for the community and the HeadQuarters for our BD activities.

I’ll be attending the EthCC and Decoded for those that will want to meet with me. I’m always available on Discord and Tg : @dondiegosanchez or on X : @SanchezCrypto

You can find my full application here :  [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sRN0uOS1xLFIjfK51BolNsqZjh7M-OUg5XX79OqkKHs/edit?usp=sharing](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sRN0uOS1xLFIjfK51BolNsqZjh7M-OUg5XX79OqkKHs/edit?usp=sharing)

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Proposal - Lucy Coulden
items.content:
**Head Ambassador Proposal - Lucy Coulden**

**X:** @lucycoulden

**[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lucy-coulden-a64b462a/?originalSubdomain=uk)**

**Discord:** lucycoulden57130

**TG:** @lulu\_clden

![](https://i.ibb.co/xhw7SfQ/Screenshot-2024-07-08-at-20-01-52.png)

Hey, Lucy here, taking the plunge and putting myself forward with the ambition of becoming a significant contributor towards this exciting new rollout of the Head Ambassador program. I started thinking about writing this proposal when I left my role at Parity in March 2024. Four months, five countries, many conferences, events and support later, it is time for me to pin my face to the OpenGov wall and take my shot!

**Intro & Professional Background**

Many of you will already know me (hopefully!), but here's a brief introduction & background to myself: I live in London and worked at Parity from March 2022 to March 2024, initially as an Executive Assistant to Bjorn Wagner (CEO, co-founder of Parity Technology & WEB 3 advisor), and later as Director of Executive Operations. Prior to this, I worked at Improbable (a Gaming turned Metaverse-focused company), supporting the C-suite team and at Atomico (a VC firm) supporting CEO Niklas Zennström. Befor tech, I also have spent 5 years in the Private Equity world, supporting both IR and Deal teams and earlier, in recruitment & BD. There have been some calls to share CVs so [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vzDF76y_bwAcEvDkYjYkVEP6eGhIygtd/view?usp=drive_link) is the unabridged version of my along with my [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lucy-coulden-a64b462a/?originalSubdomain=uk).

A constant thread throughout my career has been my gravitation towards forging and nurturing relationships, without prejudice. Regardless of role, seniority, internal or external, I am passionate about people and really getting under the skin of every business that I have chosen to become a part of. With Polkadot, that driver has been stronger than ever, which has led, in particular, to me spending the past few months submerged in the organized chaos that is this beautiful community, working together with a number of teams on event production and delivery, DF funding proposals and navigating the system, solidifying and growing my network so that when the time is right, I can utilize every tool that I have in my kit to bring new teams, cash and passionate people into our ecosystem.

Whilst at Parity, I worked closely with senior management on a daily basis. My role very much evolved over time as as I outgrew the remits of an Executive Assistant and pushed to become increasingly more involved with key relationship management, centered on nurturing existing relationships with major Polkadot stakeholders and subsequently curating events specifically focused on engaging investors with the ecosystem, the momentum of which I continue to build upon.

As part of the ongoing changes, it was foreseeable the my role at Parity was destined to be ‘decentralized along with many others and with this in mind, I began to formulate ideas about how I could strengthen my position with the community and expand on my work at Parity to be able to contribute most thoughtfully and successfully to Polkadot as a whole. After leaving Parity in March, on excellent terms with the concrete backing of management to remain - and hopefully flourish! - in the ecosystem, I was locked in!

Whilst being fairly entrenched in the space for two years, I have not been active in OpenGov for anywhere near as long as some of you, however, as part of my now new independent role, I am extremely eager to get stuck in, looking to delve into, engage & contribute to new facets of the ecosystem. Which brings us to today and what I hope is the serendipitous timing of this exciting, forward-looking vision of the Ambassador program.

**What can I offer and how would I look to deliver the most from the role?**

As touched on, I left Parity with strong networks but also a lot of continued support from key figures and I believe that I am particularly well-positioned to leverage this and to hit the ground running on the BD and VC side of the business. As well as having unique and direct communication lines with notable figures within Parity and the Web3 Foundation through my central role there, I have already fostered valuable, ongoing relationships with HNW and influential people both deeply embedded within the Polkadot universe and those circling it.

As part of the HA role, I am very confident that I have the networks and skills needed to individually foster and bring in the right types of new partnerships and business opportunities that will bring continued success. Alongside this, I am determined to build upon the previously mentioned **investor events blueprint** that I had started running with Parity. My aim is to deliver impeccably curated investor events as well as networking opportunities for founders and builders, running both more intimate VIP-style mixers as well as more relaxed events running alongside the main Polkadot and other Blockchain Festivals, of which I already have connections and past experience attending / organizing for.

The first of this series kicked off at the Polkadot Blockchain Academy (PBA) at Berkeley University, USA in August 2023. I led the event from conception through to delivery and post event follow-up and analysis. Here, we brought three distinctive groups of people together: Polkadot Founders (current and those on the Founders Track programme at PBA), Polkadot senior leadership and external investors (largely CEO / C-Suite representatives from Silicon Valley based companies). Attendees included Dr. Gavin Wood, Rob Habermeier, Bjorn Wagner, parachain leadership, including Unit Network, Nodle, KILT, Oak Capital, InvArch, and C-Suite members from Dragonfly, Goldman Sachs, Polychain, Kraken and others (25 institutions in total). There was a cocktail mixer, followed by a private dinner with a smaller group of people.

With this vision in mind, I had preliminary conversations with some of the main teams currently behind organizing and running Polkadot events and our presence at global events. I have been met with sincere encouragement and excitement for my vision of working synergistically with them. To that end, I am hosting the Venture Hub lounge and stage at Decoded by Decentered Studios this coming week, where I look forward to seeing many of you, and assisting the Polkabiz and PolkaPort East teams with their Decoded side events.

Leaning into my network going forward, going forward I would look to bring in a notable management presence from within the ecosystem to these events in order to bolster credibility and give the investors/prospective projects we are attracting opportunities for direct engagement with core legacy architects and visionaries of the space.

I aim to create spaces where founders and builders are offered valuable networking experiences with investors, but also a stage and opportunity for our existing ecosystem MVPs to support and offer feedback to other newer prospective businesses that are being introduced to and encouraged to interact with Polkadot. There is a wealth of experience within the Polkadot ecosystem but also a huge space in which new businesses and individuals can prosper - ensuring that these two factions have access to and support each other will have boundless benefits to the community overall.

I also envisage these spaces becoming flagship mixers for other Ambassadors to come together and to also ‘show off’ the community, building excitement with valuable individuals & projects that they are already working on bringing into the space. As well as helping us all in converting warm relationships into future growth, these events would organically attract the attention of exciting new opportunities which we can collectively then start to nurture. Curating and representing these functions from the role as a Head Ambassador would certainly bring them even more credibility and in turn I believe they would provide a lot of benefit and value back to the program and polkadot as a whole.

_An environment known for exciting people and visions will attract the continued attention of serious investors. A space with serious investors will attract exciting visionaries._

**Relevant experience/achievements over the last 2 years, including work post-Parity**

-   2022 Decoded NYC, Speaker Management
-   Assisted in delivering Polkadot’s event presence at:
    -   Davos 2022
    -   Coinbase Consensus 2023
    -   Proof of Talk Paris 2023
    -   Web Summit Lisbon 2023
-   Polkadot Evenings: Investor x Founder (dinners, mixers) - a concept that I created
    -   2023 PBA Berkeley. Investor x Founder mixer with key Silicon Valley investors including DragonFly, Goldman Sachs, Kraken, Electric Capital, Polychain
    -   2023 Silicon Valley VIP Investor Dinner. Lead, organized and hosted the event which targeted increased engagement with external Investor pools (with attendance of Dr. Gavin Wood).
    -   2023 Web3 Summit VIP Investor Dinner. Lead, organized and hosted event with high profile attendees, including Ed Hesse, Bjorn Wagner, Fabian Gompf, Mark Cachia and a number of key target investor groups.
    -   2024 PBA Hong Kong - Investor x Founder mixer
-   Pro-actively sought out to re-engage with Parity's Investor Relations professionals of the past to market-map a (to that point undocumented) list of previous and current investors / leads in order to reinvigorate that internal aspect of BD and then begin pinpointing future opportunities.
-   Opened new and increased lines of engagement between notable larger DOT holders & Parity, documenting current support and access to technical updates, events, and OpenGov and looking engaging with them on how services can be improved/tailored specifically to increase both the value offered and the value they, in turn, could then provide back to the ecosystem.
-   Organised and hosted a number of intimate leadership retreats & gatherings for key players across Parity and Web3.
-   **Member of the Investor Relations Society**. Recently completed a number of courses and attended their Annual Summit in London, June 2024.
-   **Member of the Black Swan Community**

Since leaving Parity in March 2024, I have worked with a number of different projects and attended a number of community and external events with the aim of immersing myself within the wider community, deepening my understanding of the technology and hoping to build upon some of the initiatives I had started.

-   Sub0 Asia, March - speaker management & agenda support
-   Token2049 Dubai, April - attendee
-   Decentralised Lugano (Scytale), May - attendee
-   Polkadot: Dawn of RWAs hosted by Xcavate in London, July - assisted with invitations, attendee coordination, event execution and data gathering post-event 2024
-   Decoded, July - working with Decentered Studios on delivering Decoded. Managing the Venture Hub and lounge across the two days.
-   2024 Polkabiz Investor x Founder evening, July - supporting Polkabiz in delivering their first key event since receiving funding
-   2024 PolkaPort East private investor dinner, July - leveraging my network to assist the team with their event

**Wrapping things up**

Before starting to write a proposal, it was important to me that I took the time to read over the past wins, difficulties faced and community feedback with the previous Ambassador program to recognize its hard-fought achievements and hope to retain a lot of the value it brought as well as to understanding how the community thought the new program should next evolve and blossom into its new form. More recently, I considered it important to see who else was applying for the new programme in order to ascertain how my skill set would be a welcome and complementary addition.Having done so, I hope to be positioned to provide real value back to the community and genuinely deliver on the vision this new version of the program promises.

I am vehement about continuing a journey within the space to the point where I have self-funded travel and been happy to work for free on all the bits and pieces that I have been involved with since leaving Parity. Whilst I am not yet as known in the ecosystem / governance realm as some other candidates I hope you can see that I am very much ‘on the ground’ and involved in promoting Polkadot however possible. I hope my unique insight and connections will bring a slightly different skill set that is needed and one which can help enhance and complement the work of the other great ambassadors already in place.

I wholeheartedly believe in this program and how much I would be able to contribute to it; whether it's fostering and converting relationships; creating innovative, unifying spaces for the advent of new partnerships and evolution of old or providing whatever necessary support and organizational structure that will be required in order to robustly grow and build out the program past its inception.

If selected to join the ‘dream team’, I would remain agile and responsive to evolving market dynamics in order to maintain my tenure. I honestly cannot imagine a next chapter I would rather commit my focus to than continuing to work in this arena - hence taking the plunge and putting myself in the firing line (finally!).

It would be a privilege for the opportunity to give my all in continuing to push Polkadot to the forefront of people's minds and elevating it towards its extraordinary and wonderful potential! I'm here and keen to engage, so please feel free to ask any questions you have, and I will do my very best to answer.

See y’all at Decoded in Brussels this week!

Lucy

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application: Bekka
items.content:
![Gavin and I at the acdemy](https://i.ibb.co/DV6KjdQ/16427-Bekka-1720206750780.jpg)

Dear Polkadot community,

I'm [Ayomide Bajo(Bekka)(X)](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo) and this is my application for the Polkadot Head Ambassador position.

### About me

As a developer, I started my journey into the Polkadot ecosystem by applying to the Polkadot Blockchain Academy and becoming a successful graduate in 2023. In the middle of 2023, I became an ambassador and ever since I’ve been contributing to the growth of Polkadot in Africa, writing articles on [my blog](https://dev.to/ayomide_bajo) about Polkadot and representing wherever i attend web3 events, like the one at [devconnect Istanbul](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1722272797450457500). I’m also a key contributor to Rust Nigeria, one of Africa's strongest Rust communities. Polkadot is built using substrate and substrate is built using Rust.

With the support of the African community, I created the [official Twitter account for Polkadot Africa](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) and I’m currently its manager. I have hosted a few Twitter(X) spaces since then which has brought warmth and growth to the community. I and other African ambassadors have been building Polkadot Africa.

Currently, I’m working as a technical writer at Polytope Labs. I’m a member of Chaos Dao and also part of H.E.R DAO’s executive team in Nigeria.

### Personal achievements in the web3 space

-   Graduated from the Polkadot Blockchain Academy in 2023 in the Buenos Aires cohort.
-   Onboarded 250+ developers into the [Rust Nigeria online community](https://www.meetup.com/rust-meetup-group/) in less than a year.
-   I started the [Polkadot Africa Twitter](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) monthly spaces and we have had over 4 meetup events in different parts of Africa since I started building the community.
-   Got elected to be a steward lead in H.E.R DAO Nigeria.
-   Hosted the [first meetup event in Lagos](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1799525508381614548) after almost 2 years.

### Experience

-   Previously worked as frontend developer in tech and wrote frontend code for 3 years professionally
-   Picked up technical writing and became a technical writer at Draft.dev
-   Joined the [Rust Nigeria ecosystem](https://x.com/RustNigeria) and grew to become one of its executives.
-   H.E.R DAO Nigeria Lead.
-   Ambassador at Polkadot and Technical ambassador at Phala network
-   Technical writer at Polytope Labs

### Ecosystem achievements

I created the [Polkadot Africa Twitter account](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) and since then we’ve had the following growth since i started headlining the community for the past 8 months.

-   [Community partnership with Rust Nigeria](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1762805631331795406?s=46) for the Twitter space.
-   Monthly Twitter(X) space hosting great minds and curious audiences.
-   The discord server now has some warmth and activity compared to before including the African channel in the global server.
-   The [first meetup in Africa](https://x.com/dr_sirjey/status/1785267053349208319?s=46). Northern, Nigeria.
-   The [second meetup was in Africa](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1795041833262747932?s=46). Kampala, Uganda.
-   The [third meetup](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1801207939463594365?s=46). Lagos, Nigeria
-   [Northern Nigeria meetup](https://x.com/dr_sirjey/status/1799514827481596185?s=46) for the second time.
-   [Northern Nigeria meetup](https://x.com/web3naija/status/1807808719842836583?s=46) but this time in another location.

This is just the beginning and we achieved these results with little resources and passionate teammates. I believe with more support from the global community, we will experience bigger growth!

### Visions and goals

To keep this proposal brief, I created a document highlighting my visions, goals and the [next steps for the African community](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1V4FxKbjLtT3riwLIEKMq5PjwrffiHpxv6nyX9wEepvs/edit#heading=h.fztrpba70nqo)

### Conclusion

We know Polkadot has the tech. Polkadot powers Depin, AI, Bridges, and Oracles. It is also cheap, fast and great for developers who also want to experiment with advanced ideas on the blockchain. With the help of the community, we can push this out there to Africans and the global community and achieve a community of innovators, community builders, developers, advocates and other different types of contributors.

Thank you for reading this far ✨

Warm regards, Ayomide Bajo(Bekka)

P.S. to clarify the rumours about me. Please check this [short thread](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1812173031650873419) for clarifications or dm on Twitter.

I'm [Ayomide Bajo(Bekka)(X)](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo) and this is my application for the Polkadot Head Ambassador position.


### About me
As a developer, I started my journey into the Polkadot ecosystem by applying to the Polkadot Blockchain Academy and becoming a successful graduate in 2023. In the middle of 2023, I became an ambassador and ever since I’ve been contributing to the growth of Polkadot in Africa, writing articles on [my blog](https://dev.to/ayomide_bajo) about Polkadot and representing wherever i attend web3 events, like the one at [devconnect Istanbul](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1722272797450457500). I’m also a key contributor to Rust Nigeria, one of Africa's strongest Rust communities. Polkadot is built using substrate and substrate is built using Rust. 

With the support of the African community, I created the [official Twitter account for Polkadot Africa](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) and I’m currently its manager. I have hosted a few Twitter(X) spaces since then which has brought warmth and growth to the community. I and other African ambassadors have been building Polkadot Africa. 

Currently, I’m working as a technical writer at Polytope Labs. I’m a member of Chaos Dao and also part of H.E.R DAO’s executive team in Nigeria.

### Personal achievements in the web3 space
- Graduated from the Polkadot Blockchain Academy in 2023 in the Buenos Aires cohort.
- Onboarded 250+ developers into the [Rust Nigeria online community](https://www.meetup.com/rust-meetup-group/) in less than a year.
- I started the [Polkadot Africa Twitter](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) monthly spaces and we have had over 4 meetup events in different parts of Africa since I started building the community.
- Got elected to be a steward lead in H.E.R DAO Nigeria.
- Hosted the[ first meetup event in Lagos](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1799525508381614548) after almost 2 years.

### Experience
- Previously worked as frontend developer in tech and wrote frontend code for 3 years professionally
- Picked up technical writing and became a technical writer at Draft.dev
- Joined the [Rust Nigeria ecosystem](https://x.com/RustNigeria) and grew to become one of its executives.
- H.E.R DAO Nigeria Lead.
- Ambassador at Polkadot and Technical ambassador at Phala network
- Technical writer at Polytope Labs

### Ecosystem achievements
I created the [Polkadot Africa Twitter account](https://twitter.com/AfricaPolkadot) and since then we’ve had the following growth since i started headlining the community for the past 8 months.

- [Community partnership with Rust Nigeria](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1762805631331795406?s=46) for the Twitter space.
- Monthly Twitter(X) space hosting great minds and curious audiences.
- The discord server now has some warmth and activity compared to before including the African channel in the global server.
- The [first meetup in Africa](https://x.com/dr_sirjey/status/1785267053349208319?s=46). Northern, Nigeria.
- The [second meetup was in Africa](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1795041833262747932?s=46). Kampala, Uganda.
- The [third meetup](https://x.com/africapolkadot/status/1801207939463594365?s=46). Lagos, Nigeria
- [Northern Nigeria meetup](https://x.com/dr_sirjey/status/1799514827481596185?s=46) for the second time. 
- [Northern Nigeria meetup](https://x.com/web3naija/status/1807808719842836583?s=46) but this time in another location.

This is just the beginning and we achieved these results with little resources and passionate teammates. I believe with more support from the global community, we will experience bigger growth!


### Visions and goals
To keep this proposal brief, I created a document highlighting my visions, goals and the [next steps for the African community](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1V4FxKbjLtT3riwLIEKMq5PjwrffiHpxv6nyX9wEepvs/edit#heading=h.fztrpba70nqo)

### Conclusion
We know Polkadot has the tech. Polkadot powers Depin, AI, Bridges, and Oracles. It is also cheap, fast and great for developers who also want to experiment with advanced ideas on the blockchain.
With the help of the community, we can push this out there to Africans and the global community and achieve a community of innovators, community builders, developers, advocates and other different types of contributors.

Thank you for reading this far ✨

Warm regards,
Ayomide Bajo(Bekka)


P.S. to clarify the rumours about me. Please check this [short thread](https://x.com/ayomide_bajo/status/1812173031650873419) for clarifications or dm on Twitter.

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application: DJ Hà Trang & SubWallet
items.content:
GM everyone! I’m DJ Hà Trang, Research Lead at SubWallet. This is my Polkadot Head Ambassador application. The full proposal can be found [here](https://subwallet.notion.site/Head-Ambassador-Application-fc6e9c2854834372bcd2528a304aa20c?pvs=4).

## Collective efforts by SubWallet team

---

All responsibilities during my Head Ambassador tenure will be conducted by the whole SubWallet team, not only me. I therefore act as a representative and core contributor to these collective efforts.

## Contributions by SubWallet team in Polkadot

---

![](https://subwallet.notion.site/image/https%3A%2F%2Fprod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fd16d076d-5cfb-4659-8bba-1937d748e878%2F622eebc4-acbd-4104-b7e5-00a69746193b%2FUntitled.png?table=block&id=75740f94-b9e7-42b0-a599-aacc57285fce&spaceId=d16d076d-5cfb-4659-8bba-1937d748e878&width=2000&userId=&cache=v2)

SubWallet entered the Polkadot ecosystem in November 2021, and has since become a proactive agent with major contributions to the ecosystem. Some highlights for the past 2.5 years:

- Develop products to bring the ecosystem closer to mass users: [SubWallet](https://www.subwallet.app/), [Dotinsights](https://dotinsights.subwallet.app/), [Playnation](https://t.me/Playnation_bot)
- Organize local events to introduce Polkadot to users and communities in Vietnam: [Polkadot Decoded 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=USMo357-3Io), [Beyond The Chain Vietnam 2023](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kEm42m8vDJs), [DOTinVietnam 2022](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_qySe3CV4Fc)
- Attract the best developers to the ecosystem: [Appota](https://appota.com/), [Kyber Network](https://kyber.network/), [Birdeye](https://birdeye.so/),...
- Attend events to represent SubWallet and Polkadot: [Token2049 Singapore 2023 and PolkadotNow Pulse Dubai 2024](https://x.com/PolkadotNow/status/1779994127360290881), [Sub0](https://x.com/Polkadot/status/1771156484681842725), TeamZ Web3 Summit Japan 2024, [ETHcc 2024 and Polkadot Decoded Brussels 2024](https://x.com/Polkadot/status/1811804864197914900), Polkadot Safari 2023, [Polkadot Now India 2023](https://x.com/subwalletapp/status/1642847885837606912)
- Give talk and introduce Polkadot to future founders: Polkadot Blockchain Academy ([Hong Kong](https://x.com/RyanDinh8/status/1750449309496312103), [Singapore](https://x.com/AcademyPolkadot/status/1803253584634454243)), [Founder Institute Web3 ASEAN](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7216983293840216064/),...

## Polkadot Head Ambassador of APAC

---

As the Polkadot Head Ambassador of APAC, we plan to focus on spreading the Polkadot brand in APAC and onboarding enterprises to the Polkadot ecosystem.

### Branding: Spread Polkadot brand in the region

- Delegate personnel to participate in Web3 events around Asia and other continents to introduce Polkadot
- Collaborate with partners and friends to promote the Polkadot brand to organizations
- Team up with leading Web2 organizations such as Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Alibaba Cloud to organize activities for Web3 developers and onboard them to Polkadot

### Business Development 

#### Onboard SEA enterprises: 

- Targeted global agency: Publicis Groupe, WPP, Havas Group, Dentsu
- Targeted enterprise clients: Pepsi, Redbull/Warrior, VBL Group (Heineken/Tiger), Budweiser
- Targeted top local agencies: Omega Group, Adtima (VNG Group), Adsota (Appota Group),...

#### Onboard top-tier SEA Web2 game publisher: 

We will work with Web2 game publishing companies to integrate mass-adopted games to Polkadot.
- [Amanotes](https://www.amanotes.com/): Top 1 music game app on Appstore global
- [VNG](https://www.vng.com.vn/): Top 1 game publisher in Vietnam and the first unicorn startup in Vietnam. VNG is also the PubG license owner in Vietnam.
- And more

### Ecosystem Collaboration
- Connect and develop an extensive Ambassador network: We plan to connect and develop an extensive Ambassador network in the APAC area with the mission of expanding the Polkadot brand. At the same time, we will collaborate closely with other Head Ambassadors to support each other and brainstorm common activities and initiatives.
- Participate in and initiate in-depth discussions: We plan to coordinate support with other project teams to find solutions to improve current ecosystem problems, such as user experience, marketing strategy, product development strategy and so on.

## Compensation
---
The compensation for Head Ambassador will not be used to pay salary for the SubWallet team. Instead, it will cover expenses related to Head Ambassador responsibilities such as travel costs and BD expenses.


The full proposal can be found [here](https://subwallet.notion.site/Head-Ambassador-Application-fc6e9c2854834372bcd2528a304aa20c?pvs=4).

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application - Mario Schraepen
items.content:
gm Polkadot friends,

I’m Mario Schraepen, a serial entrepreneur with 11.000 followers on Linkedin, and the CEO of LinkedCar and founder of PolkaBiz. I am a graduate of the PBA in Hong Kong (with distinction!), have a background in IT, and hold an MBA. As a speaker at various (startup) events, including Decoded Brussels, I bring a wealth of experience and a passion for innovation to the table.

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/1985bf_acabb5a186514f89bbe8bfc860d4b120~mv2.png)

As the founder of PolkaBiz, Christian Casini and I have successfully launched a program in just 3 months that helps Polkadot starters refine their pitches to attract investors. We collaborate closely with the Polkadot Blockchain Academy, even travelling to Singapore to offer one-on-one assistance to 26 students. At Decoded, PolkaBiz organises a side-investor night with 60 founders and 40 (!!)  investors, followed by a sold-out Groove Night for 300 people.
I am an active member of various European organisations such as INATBA, MyData Global, EBSI, 2Tokens, the European Blockchain Regulatory Sandbox, Crypto Valley Association and DSSC. I closely follow European regulations like the EU Data Act and eIDAS2, focusing primarily on Europe but remaining open to global opportunities.
I'm excited to bring my experience and vision to the role of Polkadot Head Ambassador. By consistently prioritising Polkadot, I have earned the community's trust. My collaborative spirit and PBA expertise empower me to effectively communicate Polkadot's strengths and unite diverse individuals toward common goals.

### My Involvement
I firmly believe that a Head Ambassador (HA) should be a connector, building bridges both internally and externally to attract more people to Polkadot. I have already demonstrated what I can achieve in the short term within Polkadot, and now I want to extend that impact over the long term. One of my ultimate goals is to bring Polkadot believers together. A decentralised community like ours thrives on listening to different perspectives and understanding what drives each person. I am passionate about creating an environment where everyone feels heard and valued, as unity enables us to achieve remarkable things together.
I also believe that an HA should, when necessary, speak openly and provide critical opinions on OpenGov, always grounded in facts.
 
### Collaborative Working Groups
While the Head Ambassador is the “face”, the role is far from a one-person job. It involves a collective effort. These selected “senior ambassadors” and “ambassadors” will be divided into various working groups. These meetings will be invitation-only and compensated in DOTs, supporting the ecosystem and recognizing the ambassadors' contributions. This amount will come from the monthly fee I receive as HA.

Working Groups I propose :
1. Old Ambassador (Temporary):
We shouldn't lose the knowledge and expertise of former head ambassadors. I want to set up meetings to learn from their experiences and challenges. (and eventually pick up where they left)
2. Investor Relations:
By inviting 40 investors to the Decoded event, I am well-positioned to maintain these relationships. Within this working group we want to reduce the pressure on the treasury and connect our Polkadot startups with investors quickly.
3. Business Development & Marketing:
Our goal is to promote Polkadot to the outside world, including at external events where I can speak (or other senior ambassadors / ambassadors), and to market our ecosystem effectively. Our marketing message must be consistent; promoting Polkadot as mere "software" can be improved. Currently, every treasury request seems to start from scratch. We can definitely optimise this.
4. Accountability & Reputation Management:
I strongly advocate for reputation management. Those who positively contribute to the community should be rewarded, while scammers should be removed. I believe in facts and figures, follow-up, and milestone-based payouts to improve our ecosystem.
5. Ecosystem Support:
There are many parachains and applications that are often left alone. We need community assistance to ensure they thrive. Startups need to be visible during webinars or events. In this working group we will discuss how we can achieve more visibility for selected startups/parachains/apps at a fraction of the cost..
6. Technical Support:
While my technical contribution may be minimal, given my PBA background, I acknowledge its importance and will support it with a working group.  
 
 
All findings from the 6 working groups will be discussed centrally with all HAs, allowing us to make better-informed decisions for the community's benefit.
Thank you for considering my application. I am confident that, together with the right senior ambassadors and ambassadors, I can make a positive impact on the ecosystem. I have already demonstrated this over the past few months.

**Please read the full manifesto : **
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sxJLBFqN1cdA4pcq756NN5RCP7GoWVF36rMEeLkWdUM/edit?usp=sharing
 
Warm regards,
Mario Schraepen

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application - Jimmy Tudeski
items.content:
**Dear Polkadot Community,**

My name is Jimmy Tudeski, known as Stakenode (https://x.com/stakenode_dev). With a deep passion for blockchain and a steadfast commitment to the Polkadot ecosystem, I am eager to bring my experience and vision to the role of Polkadot Head Ambassador. I find myself as a Polkadot resident, all my stakes and heart are here, in the Polkadot ecosystem.

I have consistently prioritized the growth of the Polkadot ecosystem over personal interests. My dedication and passion as an ambassador and my role as a Polkadot and Kusama validator reflect my unwavering commitment. I have earned the trust of the community by always putting Polkadot first. My collaborative spirit and technical expertise enable me to effectively communicate Polkadot's selling points and align diverse individuals toward shared goals.

**My Journey with Polkadot**

I embarked on my journey within the Polkadot ecosystem in May 2020 as an enthusiastic content creator and community supporter. Over the years, I have expanded my roles to parachain and Polkadot ambassador (Senior in the old program), parachains council member, community builder, Polkadot and Kusama validator, and honored representative of Polkadot Decentralized Voices program 1st cohort. My contributions have been diverse, from writing detailed guides, creating educational content, and representing Polkadot at ecosystem events to providing technical support, building the local Polkadot community in Poland, and actively participating in governance.

I believe in the potential of Polkadot technology and the power of the Polkadot community. Through my experience, I know the strength and dedication of this community. I am committed to continuing to build a thriving ecosystem by onboarding competent and passionate Senior Ambassadors and Ambassadors. My mission is to make this program successful and our ecosystem the default choice for builders, larger enterprises, and governments. I aim to make Polkadot an example of the practical benefits that Web3 brings to the world.

**My Head Ambassador Vision and Mission**

The role of the Head Ambassador is pivotal in shaping the future of the Polkadot ecosystem. 

Navigating the world of decentralized decision-making can be a bit chaotic, but honestly, I thrive in that environment. Polkadot has been my playground for years, and I've learned a ton about how to make sense of the chaos and turn it into something amazing. One of my ultimate goals is to bring Polkadot people together. A decentralized community like ours is about listening to different perspectives, understanding what drives each person, and finding common ground. I love creating a space where everyone feels heard and valued because we can achieve incredible things when we're united.

I see myself more as a guide and leader. One of my goals is to empower the Polkadot community, giving it the tools and support it needs to shine. Whether mentoring new ambassadors, helping you navigate governance, or just answering questions, I’m here to ensure everyone can contribute their best. The blockchain world is always changing, and I’m all about staying ahead of the curve.

I’m committed to learning and adapting to help guide our community through whatever comes next.

Staying proactive means we can turn potential challenges into new opportunities. By building a strong, united community and embracing the strengths of decentralized decision-making, I believe we can make Polkadot a shining example of what’s possible.

**Education and Technical Translation**

I’m passionate about education and sharing knowledge, especially regarding the amazing stuff happening in the Polkadot ecosystem. Here’s what I’ve got planned to help us all get on the same page and make the most out of Polkadot’s potential:

I’m about to host regular workshops and spaces to explore Polkadot’s architecture, governance, and all the cool things parachains can do. These events will be a great place to learn, ask questions, and get hands-on with the tech.

Navigating the Polkadot ecosystem can be tricky, so I've put together some super practical guides. These will cover everything from using different applications to understanding how Polkadot works. Whether you're a newbie or a seasoned pro, these guides will help you get the most out of the platform.

I love talking about Polkadot and am committed to representing our community at global conferences and events. It’s about spreading the word and raising awareness and understanding of what Polkadot can do. I’ll be there, sharing our story and the amazing potential of our ecosystem.

**Onboarding and Empowerment**

My biggest goals are to bring in new ambassadors at all levels—seasoned pros or just starting—and get them pumped about driving Polkadot’s growth. Here’s how I plan to make that happen:

Onboarding New Ambassadors - I’m about welcoming new faces into our community. I want to ensure that new ambassadors, whether senior, ambassador-level, or candidates, feel right at home and ready to dive in. I’ll guide them through the onboarding process, answering questions and providing the support they need to hit the ground running. I also want to go back to discussing some initiatives I see opportunities for Polkadot Ambassadors program growth - like the rejected proposal by StakePlus - https://polkadot.polkassembly.io/referenda/601 - I feel there is a lot of potential in this proposal when adjusted to Ambassador Program development needs.

Empowering the Community - Empowerment is key. I believe in giving everyone the tools and resources they need to succeed. By supporting our ambassadors, we can create a ripple effect and positive impact throughout the ecosystem. When each ambassador is equipped and confident, they can do incredible things for Polkadot.

Creating a Strong Network - No single Head Ambassador can do it all, but we can achieve amazing things together. I want to ensure that our group of Ambassadors and Senior Ambassadors has everything they need to be effective and impactful. This means providing training, resources, and a strong support network so we can all learn from each other and grow together.

**Governance and Community Building**

I’ve been deeply involved in Polkadot governance and have a pretty good grasp of how things work around here. Governance is a crucial part of our ecosystem, and I’m super excited to share how I plan to build on this and further strengthen our community. First, having been knee-deep in Polkadot governance and being a representative for the 1st Decentralized Voices cohort, I know the ins and outs of the system. I've seen everything from proposals and referenda to different tracks and OpenGov drama. This experience has given me a solid foundation to help guide others and ensure our governance processes are smooth and effective.

Governance can be complex, especially for newcomers. We can provide personalized guidance and support by pairing experienced members with new ambassadors. This will help newcomers understand the governance system and become active, informed participants. Inclusivity is key. I’m committed to ensuring everyone, regardless of background or experience level, feels welcome and valued in our community. This means actively reaching out to underrepresented groups and ensuring our governance processes are transparent and accessible to all.

Governance only works if people participate. I’ll work hard to encourage more community members to participate in governance. This could be through educational initiatives, regular updates on governance matters, and creating easy-to-understand guides on participating in votes and proposals. Governance isn’t just about voting; it’s also about contributing to the ecosystem meaningfully. I’ll lead initiatives encouraging community members to use the OpenGov model to enable collectives and fellowships. I’m committed to continuously seeking feedback from the community and proposing improvements based on that feedback. By staying responsive and adaptive, we can ensure that our governance processes evolve to meet the needs of our growing ecosystem.

**Business Development Focus Areas**

As a dedicated and passionate advocate for Polkadot, my business development strategy is centered on fostering collaboration and supporting ecosystem agents to drive significant growth and adoption. By working closely with these talented individuals and groups, we can elevate Polkadot as a premier blockchain technology and a leader in the Web3 space. Here’s how I envision how to achieve this together:

Support agents in highlighting real-world use cases and success stories to showcase Polkadot's decentralized and resilient blockchain solution capabilities and assist in forming alliances with key industry players and governmental bodies globally to promote collaborative projects and initiatives.

By aligning with principles such as those recently outlined by the Danish FSA - https://www.dfsa.dk/news/2024/jun/crypto-assets_250624, Polkadot can ensure compliance with regulatory frameworks, fostering trust and legitimacy not only within the EU but on a global scale. This proactive approach will position Polkadot at the forefront of the blockchain industry, recognized by governments, enterprises, NGOs, and institutions as a leading decentralized and resilient blockchain platform.

**Positioning Polkadot in the European Blockchain Sandbox**

I aim to position Polkadot in the forthcoming cohorts of the European Blockchain Sandbox, a regulatory sandbox that aims to establish a pan-European framework for regulatory dialogue. This initiative, led by the European Commission, brings together national and EU regulators with providers of innovative blockchain applications to identify possible issues and solutions from a legal and regulatory perspective in a safe and confidential environment. By participating in the European Blockchain Sandbox, Polkadot can Showcase Regulatory Compliance: Highlight Polkadot’s alignment with GDPR, Cyber Security, AML, and MiCAR compliance, demonstrating how it supports efficient and effective compliance and oversight. Promote Innovative Use Cases: Participate in dialogues covering applications like Battery Passports, Cultural Asset Passports, and EU ETS / MRV regulatory areas, showcasing Polkadot’s versatility and applicability across various sectors. Set New Standards: Collaborate with regulators and industry leaders to refine best practices and set new standards for the blockchain industry, particularly in defining and operating compliant DAOs. Polkadot is the world's biggest and most advanced DAO.

The trajectory of DAOs is set to redefine the future of organizational management and asset control. According to the World Economic Forum, DAOs are the future way of doing business and are transforming corporate formation. The potential for DAO treasuries to grow to USD 10 trillion in the next decade underscores the need for robust, scalable, and secure blockchain solutions like Polkadot. Polkadot’s vision of interoperability, security, scalability, and democratic governance aligns perfectly with the future direction of digital and decentralized organizational structures. As DAOs continue to rise in prominence and asset control, Polkadot is set to be the backbone of this transformative movement, leading the way toward a decentralized, efficient, and secure future. By focusing on these areas and empowering ecosystem agents with innovative initiatives, ideas, and precise proposals, we can drive significant growth and recognition for Polkadot. This strategy will establish Polkadot as a leading blockchain technology, ensuring it remains at the forefront of the Web3 revolution, benefiting developers, businesses, governments, and the global community.

**Summary**

Becoming a Polkadot Head Ambassador is an opportunity to contribute significantly to a project I am deeply passionate about. My dedication to driving the Polkadot ecosystem forward is evident through my full-time commitment and even more than full-time work. I live and breathe Polkadot, dedicating my time and energy to ensure its success and growth. This unwavering dedication allows me to stay proactive, turn challenges into opportunities, and continuously innovate to keep our community ahead of the curve. In addition to my time commitment, I am also committed to financially supporting the growth of our community. I pledge to distribute 30% of my salary to the Polkadot Poland team. This financial contribution aims to build a thriving local community in Poland, fostering collaboration, innovation, and inclusivity. By supporting local initiatives, we can create a strong foundation that benefits the Polish community and contributes to the global Polkadot ecosystem.

That's it, Folks! Thank you for considering my application.

Regardless of the outcome, I will continue to champion the growth and development of Polkadot in every way I can. My passion for this ecosystem drives me to push forward, even if it means navigating through more challenges and taking longer to achieve our goals. As a dedicated Polkadot Resident and ecosystem agent, I believe in leading by example and inspiring others to join this mission. Your support can turn this vision into reality. Onward and upward,

Jimmy Tudeski (Stakenode)

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador for Gaming Application - Angie Dalton
items.content:
![](https://i.ibb.co/8gFXYFY/A-Dalton-Head-Ambassador.jpg)

Hello! I am excited to apply for the position of Head Ambassador for Gaming. I have been in the Polkadot ecosystem since 2019, when I was hired by Web3 Foundation as Lead Advisor on the three-year regulatory process with the SEC, which concluded with a statement that Polkadot was no longer a security - it is simply software. This was a true team effort that continues today as we strive to maintain such status. I am submitting my application for the Head Ambassador for Gaming in conjunction with our Dot Play bounty proposal. Any funds received from the treasury for the position of Head Ambassador of gaming would be used to fund a selection of streamers and influencers in gaming, after we educate them on Polkadot!

Here is a link to my proposal: 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/12et\_7fsdesB4K0l0DMzfOTvqxbpoQ11uBTTfWYrFP74/edit

history.content:
Greetings,

After [**polling the community on X**](https://x.com/AdamSteeber1/status/1801295724917010682), I have decided to throw my hat in the ring for Head Ambassador.

[**Full proposal**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TKgDVFaVkhNDl9DlbmFUwtMlyykFI8gOGYaZKgLEDNw/edit?usp=sharing)

[**Ambassador Program Document**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/17kBUg8Ahrm5UQJf-zBxvFKmqlVAjDeEz/view)

[**Main DOT Account**](https://polkadot.subscan.io/account/15FsX8EdUftorgXBjtgbdD1NesqVPwfJPL79V5JDvk2CCc9x)

[**Proxied Pure to be Promoted**](https://collectives-polkadot.subscan.io/account/127C5Cdq4CnqMP2n2noxoFwHCcoSyMh6Jysk9yJGKRdxdqAe)

Note: I need a sponsor for the decision deposit. If you believe this should be actionable and have enough DOT to place the DD, I would greatly appreciate it. Otherwise this will be totally inconsequential.

## Summary
### Objective
To be a servant to DOT holders and the Polkadot brand by providing online general & technical support for users, creating content about Polkadot governance & tech, and establishing a strong presence for Polkadot in the United States of America.
### Offerings
- Weekday [**office hours**](https://calendar.app.google/q6bZpXG8mkB9vzoWA)
- [**DOT Take livestream**](https://www.youtube.com/@hotdottake) twice per week (governance coverage)
- Once per month travel mission within the USA
- Lead the organization and coordination a DOT conference in the USA 2025
- Key X Spaces appearances
- Free bounty curator work
- Ambassador Program admin & facilitation (Google Drive, meetings, document organization, reports, communications, etc.)
### Compensation Breakdown
First month: $10,000 to purchase better equipment and relieve financial stress

Every subsequent month: $80 per hour [**logged**](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EDKwipXk_JdnYCsal7yxL7_tepUlzl48Sujm0vwi6F8/edit?usp=sharing) up to $5,000 with the other $5,000 going toward travel expenses and discretionary spending to proliferate the Polkadot brand or hire necessary talent.

14 days PTO per year ($166.66 per day). Unused PTO does not roll over.

Unused discretionary spending funds will be used to buy DOT which will be staked to support a strategic fund.
### My Story
My career has its roots in service, sales, and management. As I gained more experience in these fields, I expanded my career into professional networking, business development, and entrepreneurship/leadership. After graduating from college, I tried my hand in an analytics role within the pharmaceutical industry which gave me a strong foundation in technical writing analysis and finance/accounting in regard to insurance coverage in clinical trials.

When my children grew out of infancy, I decided to hang up my professional career and serve tables so that my wife and I wouldn’t have to pay for daycare. This flexibility ultimately led to my entry in the crypto space, though I had some experience in 2016 flipping Bitcoin for cash in downtown St. Paul. I bought some LINK in the fall of 2020 which I sold for KSM in April of 2021 to get a decent self-stake on my validator. I self-taught myself Linux system admin and node management throughout my tenure as a validator and served a long time in the Thousand Validator Program. In the fall of 2021, I decided to quit my job serving tables to focus completely on the Kusama and Polkadot ecosystems.

In my time in the ecosystem I’ve been a part of, and founded, many projects. I’ve worked with dozens of professionals including developers, artists, project managers, creative leads, and other founders. Polkadot and Kusama have served as my sandbox where all of my experience and education has come together to coordinate teams, devise programs, build my social media presence, provide well-informed commentary, and disseminate highly technical information to the layman. Additionally, my bold, free-speaking approach has also provided the community with a refreshing perspective on many occasions.

I have a very solid grasp on the happenings of the ecosystem and the sentiments of the community. Patient and persistent participation over the last 3 years has given me a confident insight to what Polkadot needs and how I can help its growth and presence. The culmination of the Ambassador Program and my robust experience in business management, along with the fact that I reside in the USA where Polkadot so desperately needs representation, opens the door to an opportunity where I can fervently serve Polkadot.

My allegiance is to you, DOT holder.

Adam Clay Steeber
history.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application: Adam Clay Steeber 🇺🇸

items.title: Polkadot Head Ambassador Application | Cris, Patricia, Tin
items.content:
Hello, We are core team members at OpenGuild are happy to apply for the Head Ambassador role in the new Ambassador Program in charge of the **Southeast Asia market** fostering the focus of building relationships with Web3.0 builders, organizations, and influencers in the SEA market to elevate the Polkadot ecosystem and Polkadot techstack.

## **CONTEXT - WHAT IS OPENGUILD?**

OpenGuild - An open community driven by Web 3.0 builders elevating Polkadot in Southeast Asia. We find & connect talents in the region and help them become a part of Polkadot to create new value.

OpenGuild Community is run by the OG Core Team, a team of dedicated long-term contributors focusing on exploring market entries and enhancing organization collaboration for Polkadot in Southeast Asia ([**Cris Nguyen](https://x.com/crisnguyen99), [Tin Chung](https://x.com/chungquantin), [Patricia Arro](https://x.com/polka_pat)**).

## **CORE TEAM MEMBERS**

We have 3 core team members with 4 more executive members in charge of BD, Marketing, Events, and Developer Relations living in SEA countries.

![image](https://i.ibb.co/r71FQBg/4429-Cris-Nguyen-1719135755257.png)

### **Cris Nguyen**

Cris has worked in the Polkadot ecosystem for 3 years, where he led the Polkadot Insider team to become the biggest research and educational media platform in the Polkadot community (handed over to the [co-founder](https://x.com/ducky_insider) in January 2024). His focus had been on business development and partnerships, working with multiple para chains and applications by addressing their marketing and community needs and helping them with community campaigns and promotions. Cris is also a prolific connector of the Polkadot ecosystem in Southeast Asia with a focus on partners including VCs, media organizations and communities, and Web3 projects. Cris has successfully organized multiple events on behalf of Polkadot in Southeast Asia with 100+ attendees. He has also been a speaker at various events, bringing Polkadot closer to local crypto communities and becoming the most active ambassador in the region. Cris had a chance to work at Moonbeam Network as a Business Development professional based in Vietnam, focused on building partnerships with builders and facilitating growth for the broader Polkadot ecosystem for 6 months.

At the current stage, Cris’s focus is Strategy Lead and Operation Manager at OpenGuild to deliver regular workshops, events, hackathons, and technical community calls, becoming the important representative of the Polkadot network in Southeast Asia market and nearly becoming a middle point of contact for Polkadot/Parachain team to any potential vendors in the market.

### **Tin Chung**

Tin has participated in a few blockchain hackathons, such as the Chainlink Spring Hackathon 2021, where my team was awarded as the Top Project Winner, and the International Blockchain Olympiad with the Category Award Winner.

Regarding Tin’s professional experience, he has experience working as a software engineer in multiple L1 blockchains, from Ethereum and Solana to Lightning Network L2 solutions on the Bitcoin blockchain, Tin is a former [Coin98 Wallet](https://x.com/coin98_wallet) engineer - one of the biggest wallet in SEA market with 10M+ users and ex-lead engineer at [Snowflake](https://x.com/snowflake_sol) - a multi-sig wallet with total 50M+ TVL at peak on Solana.

In his past startup working as a software engineer, he developed and maintained open-source SDKs and client libraries in Rust and TypeScript that help developers work with underlying protocols. On the other hand, Tin has spent a lot of time building and contributing to open-source software, especially the Polkadot SDK and Substrate framework for blockchain builders.

At the current stage, he is a PBA graduate at Singapore Cohort (Wave 5) and Dev Rel Lead at OpenGuild / Polkadot SEA with a focus on preparing technical workshop content, hosting a monthly Hackathon at OpenGuild, in charge of all the technical development. Tin was also a Rust Mentor at [Vietnam Biggest Hackathon](https://x.com/ZKPLabs/status/1792577402943701118) organized by ZKP Labs and GM Vietnam on behalf of Polkadot.

### **Patricia Arro**

Patricia has been in the blockchain space doing community marketing management for over 6 years and has worked for blockchain startups in different industries like agritech, fintech, defi, and top exchanges like Bybit and Crypto.com. Her experience started working for a crypto agency where Patricia was the blockchain educator and trainer of community moderators. This led to acquiring more experience in strategic community management that allowed her to work with Product Managers, Engineers, Dev Rels, Marketing, and Sales.

Fast forward to early 2023. Patricia worked at Parity as Polkadot’s APAC Community Manager, managing and growing APAC Ambassadors, activating local communities, and curating events/meetups. During this time, she fostered relationships with local web3 leaders, which now helps boost her current initiatives.

Currently, Patricia is part of OpenGuild which is mainly focused on growing, educating, and activating Polkadot’s developer communities in Southeast Asia. With this, she’s also representing Polkadot in the region by being invited to speak to multiple blockchain and crypto events like AIBC, Southeast Asia Blockchain Week, Thailand Blockchain Week, Sub0 Asia (as host), and multiple local/Philippine initiatives.

### **WHY DO WE PROPOSE THE HEAD AMBASSADOR ROLE AND HOW WE WILL BE ONE OF THE TOP OPTIONS?**

The OG Core Team believes that we are one of the most suitable candidates for the Head Ambassador role in Southeast Asia through our **ready-made resources, connections, partners, and diversified skills** within our team. The OG Core Team already has a large number of partners from the Polkadot ecosystem and local partners, with each member having dedicated over 3 years of full-time commitment to contributing to the ecosystem through various initiatives, building relationships, creating mutual values, and partners are always ready to activate most activities related to Polkadot. The team gathers all the necessary skills to perform well in the focused region, including leadership, operation management, strategy, partnership development, marketing and event management, content creation, community management, public speaking, technical knowledge, developer relations, programming, and most importantly, ecosystem skin-in-the-game.

We have performed the tasks we propose for HA very well in the region as a spirit of Polkadot SEA, but with the Head Ambassador role officially and appropriate resources allocated by collaborating with All Ambassadors in the program, we are confident that we can elevate our work to the next level as our official job build up a strong Polkadot presence and create outcome in SEA.

ACCESS OUR [**FULL PROPOSAL**](https://openguild.notion.site/POLKADOT-HEAD-AMBASSADOR-APPLICATION-Cris-Patricia-Tin-Southeast-Asia-focus-b25348871dc04832ab3ac8b99ea4642d) TO SEE THE AMBASSADOR STRATEGY, EXECUTION PLAN, AND HOW WE UTILIZE RESOURCES AND HELP POLKADOT ECOSYSTEM PENETRATE THE MARKET.

*Note: Proposed deliverables on behalf of Ambassadors are not in **ref#409**, but we are convinced OpenGuild core team members have been the important point of contact for anyone to Polkadot in the local market in different areas and still doing it as a spirit of Polkadot SEA contributors. We will utilize OpenGuild’s resources and Ambassador Program’s human resources to help us operate appropriately.*

![image](https://i.ibb.co/SsZD20C/4429-Cris-Nguyen-1719135785357.png)

history.content:
Hello, We are core team members at OpenGuild are happy to apply for the Head Ambassador role in the new Ambassador Program in charge of the **Southeast Asia market** fostering the focus of building relationships with Web3.0 builders, organizations, and influencers in the SEA market to elevate the Polkadot ecosystem and Polkadot techstack.

## **CONTEXT - WHAT IS OPENGUILD?**

OpenGuild - An open community driven by Web 3.0 builders elevating Polkadot in Southeast Asia. We find & connect talents in the region and help them become a part of Polkadot to create new value.

OpenGuild Community is run by the OG Core Team, a team of dedicated long-term contributors focusing on exploring market entries and enhancing organization collaboration for Polkadot in Southeast Asia ([**Cris Nguyen](https://x.com/crisnguyen99), [Tin Chung](https://x.com/chungquantin), [Patricia Arro](https://x.com/polka_pat)**).

## **CORE TEAM MEMBERS**

We have 3 core team members with 4 more executive members in charge of BD, Marketing, Events, and Developer Relations living in SEA countries.

![image](https://i.ibb.co/r71FQBg/4429-Cris-Nguyen-1719135755257.png)

### **Cris Nguyen**

Cris has worked in the Polkadot ecosystem for 3 years, where he led the Polkadot Insider team to become the biggest research and educational media platform in the Polkadot community (handed over to the [co-founder](https://x.com/ducky_insider) in January 2024). His focus had been on business development and partnerships, working with multiple para chains and applications by addressing their marketing and community needs and helping them with community campaigns and promotions. Cris is also a prolific connector of the Polkadot ecosystem in Southeast Asia with a focus on partners including VCs, media organizations and communities, and Web3 projects. Cris has successfully organized multiple events on behalf of Polkadot in Southeast Asia with 100+ attendees. He has also been a speaker at various events, bringing Polkadot closer to local crypto communities and becoming the most active ambassador in the region. Cris had a chance to work at Moonbeam Network as a Business Development professional based in Vietnam, focused on building partnerships with builders and facilitating growth for the broader Polkadot ecosystem for 6 months.

At the current stage, Cris’s focus is Strategy Lead and Operation Manager at OpenGuild to deliver regular workshops, events, hackathons, and technical community calls, becoming the important representative of the Polkadot network in Southeast Asia market and nearly becoming a middle point of contact for Polkadot/Parachain team to any potential vendors in the market.

### **Tin Chung**

Tin has participated in a few blockchain hackathons, such as the Chainlink Spring Hackathon 2021, where my team was awarded as the Top Project Winner, and the International Blockchain Olympiad with the Category Award Winner.

Regarding Tin’s professional experience, he has experience working as a software engineer in multiple L1 blockchains, from Ethereum and Solana to Lightning Network L2 solutions on the Bitcoin blockchain, Tin is a former [Coin98 Wallet](https://x.com/coin98_wallet) engineer - one of the biggest wallet in SEA market with 10M+ users and ex-lead engineer at [Snowflake](https://x.com/snowflake_sol) - a multi-sig wallet with total 50M+ TVL at peak on Solana.

In his past startup working as a software engineer, he developed and maintained open-source SDKs and client libraries in Rust and TypeScript that help developers work with underlying protocols. On the other hand, Tin has spent a lot of time building and contributing to open-source software, especially the Polkadot SDK and Substrate framework for blockchain builders.

At the current stage, he is a PBA graduate at Singapore Cohort (Wave 5) and Dev Rel Lead at OpenGuild / Polkadot SEA with a focus on preparing technical workshop content, hosting a monthly Hackathon at OpenGuild, in charge of all the technical development. Tin was also a Rust Mentor at [Vietnam Biggest Hackathon](https://x.com/ZKPLabs/status/1792577402943701118) organized by ZKP Labs and GM Vietnam on behalf of Polkadot.

### **Patricia Arro**

Patricia has been in the blockchain space doing community marketing management for over 6 years and has worked for blockchain startups in different industries like agritech, fintech, defi, and top exchanges like Bybit and Crypto.com. Her experience started working for a crypto agency where Patricia was the blockchain educator and trainer of community moderators. This led to acquiring more experience in strategic community management that allowed her to work with Product Managers, Engineers, Dev Rels, Marketing, and Sales.

Fast forward to early 2023. Patricia worked at Parity as Polkadot’s APAC Community Manager, managing and growing APAC Ambassadors, activating local communities, and curating events/meetups. During this time, she fostered relationships with local web3 leaders, which now helps boost her current initiatives.

Currently, Patricia is part of OpenGuild which is mainly focused on growing, educating, and activating Polkadot’s developer communities in Southeast Asia. With this, she’s also representing Polkadot in the region by being invited to speak to multiple blockchain and crypto events like AIBC, Southeast Asia Blockchain Week, Thailand Blockchain Week, Sub0 Asia (as host), and multiple local/Philippine initiatives.

### **WHY DO WE PROPOSE THE HEAD AMBASSADOR ROLE AND HOW WE WILL BE ONE OF THE TOP OPTIONS?**

The OG Core Team believes that we are one of the most suitable candidates for the Head Ambassador role in Southeast Asia through our **ready-made resources, connections, partners, and diversified skills** within our team. The OG Core Team already has a large number of partners from the Polkadot ecosystem and local partners, with each member having dedicated over 3 years of full-time commitment to contributing to the ecosystem through various initiatives, building relationships, creating mutual values, and partners are always ready to activate most activities related to Polkadot. The team gathers all the necessary skills to perform well in the focused region, including leadership, operation management, strategy, partnership development, marketing and event management, content creation, community management, public speaking, technical knowledge, developer relations, programming, and most importantly, ecosystem skin-in-the-game.

We have performed the tasks we propose for HA very well in the region as a spirit of Polkadot SEA, but with the Head Ambassador role officially and appropriate resources allocated by collaborating with All Ambassadors in the program, we are confident that we can elevate our work to the next level as our official job build up a strong Polkadot presence and create outcome in SEA.

ACCESS OUR [**FULL PROPOSAL**](https://openguild.notion.site/POLKADOT-HEAD-AMBASSADOR-APPLICATION-Cris-Patricia-Tin-Southeast-Asia-focus-b25348871dc04832ab3ac8b99ea4642d) TO SEE THE AMBASSADOR STRATEGY, EXECUTION PLAN, AND HOW WE UTILIZE RESOURCES AND HELP POLKADOT ECOSYSTEM PENETRATE THE MARKET.

*Note: Proposed deliverables on behalf of Ambassadors are not in **ref#409**, but we are convinced OpenGuild core team members have been the important point of contact for anyone to Polkadot in the local market in different areas and still doing it as a spirit of Polkadot SEA contributors. We will utilize OpenGuild’s resources and Ambassador Program’s human resources to help us operate appropriately.*

![image](https://i.ibb.co/SsZD20C/4429-Cris-Nguyen-1719135785357.png)

items.title: Hope Clary For Head Ambassador Team
items.content:
If I am elected a Head Ambassador (HA) for Polkadot, I will be 100% Dedicated to the Role. Knowing that I am no longer just representing myself, but a brand, which is Polkadot & Jam technology! I am an extremely passionate representative of Polkadot who resides in North America, US. 
To me the Head Ambassadors are not just faces, but speakers, strategists, facilitators of sales initiatives, internal processes and servicing the community. We lead, support and bring forth positive changes based on the best interests of Polkadot, Jam and its community.
•	Here is a bit of the contribution I have made to Polkadot thus far; https://forum.polkadot.network/t/decoded-2024-sponsorship-for-active-community-members/7654/30?u=hopeclary 
•	I understand I will be an ambassador to Polkadot’s best interests. I currently see this, but not limited to: Gaming, AI, Governess, CoreTime, Bridging Partnerships, facilitating trust within WEB3 and sharing benefits in normal relatable services of current WEB2 to facilitate transitions into WEB3.  
•	I am technical, experienced with legal negotiations & contracts in addition to translating to normie speak. Past work roles for a Network Switching Company: Corparate Technical Trainer, QA, Product Delivery, Product Manager, Product Strategy, Product Analyst. 
o	I will represent Polkadot HA on www.linkedin.com/in/hope-goodman-49217730 LinkedIn. Having worked for a fortune 100 US company for over 20+ years. I was Product Delivery for Apple Pay in the US for this Network Switching Services company, they’re the WEB2 layer 0 equivalent of Polkadot for financial transactions. Meaning, we routed transactions from point-of-sale devices through Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover and banking network funnels for approval and denial of a consumers purchases. When meeting people, if asked what I do for a living, I would share my past job experience & lead into my current role as a Polkadot HA. I will be describing what Polkadot is to businesses and the functions we provide through WEB3…. Connecting Polkadot to real world adoption, awareness & usage.
o	I can do presentations, write/collaborate on working legal agreements, and go after leads that would benefit Polkadot. I am actively going for additional collaboration initiatives for Polkadot that would help put us in the spotlight.
•	I would like to mirror a BD team like Brazil in the US, or work with this high performing team on US initiatives, as they’re part of the America’s. I understand big deals are never done alone! In addition, it has been my experience that specific skills are needed for these teams to be successful. 
•	 My goal as HA, for our HA team is to facilitate & support these initiatives. When working with global companies having representatives in multiple areas of the globe 🌐 will be beneficial. 
o	Success for global adoption of CoreTime and other products on-chain, we can introduce to businesses big and small, create strategies to execute upon! Example: reach out to local municipalities to see how various charity DAO’s within Polkadot may be of service in local communities. 
o	Beyond just charities, I see ways as a HA Team we can work to get positive media attention and connect with specific groups in our areas to help drive Polkadot forward for a WEB3 revolution! 
•	I would represent Polkadot to my Politicians, locals & in Washington DC. Living in the Miami Florida Metro area. We’re Bitcoin adaptive here (Bitcoin Bull in Financial District), I will work to drive more Polkadot adoption. Very large enterprises are moving to this area including Asset Management companies and other Fortune 500 companies in addition to TV & Movie Studio’s. As a HA Team we would collaborate on appropriate BD initiatives. 
o	I would welcome working closely and collaborating with legal counsel to facilitate deals & lobbying where appropriate.
•	 At times I will connect proposals or ideas to products within the ecosystem. I will make product recommendations & work with other talented people to make them a reality. New Product Ideas, Testing, Feedback, making introductions & pitches. Whatever is in the best interest of Polkadot and Jam!
•	With access to footage, I would make appropriate presentations and commercials.
•	 Attending and creating events locally in addition to Crypto Conferences and Conferences of industries we’re looking to break into, or expand in. 
•	 Create In person and online engagements to connect with other Crypto communities to facilitate collaboration & trust.
•	 Continued Participation in video meetings for Polkadot and Jam initiatives, Polkadot Forum, Telegram & helping people navigate all things Polkadot and Jam.
•	 Continued work on Bounties. 
•	 As HA I would always be open to connecting and creating collaborations with other Crypto Ecosystems, Participants and Products because Polkadot is the WEB3 Layer 0!
